name: Just Another Hard Game
description:
Remember those 2D platformer games you used to play as a kid, when sometimes they used to have those pesky invisible blocks that either annoyed you or lead you to secrets? Just imagine a game where the entire map is made of these blocks, And it also has spikes made of the same invisible material that appears when touched

Controls

Keyboard - Arrow keys to move, Space to jump, Up to proceed through a door.

Xbox Controller - Left analog stick to move, A to jump, X to proceed through a door.
